name: Language Museum: Cornish
description:
Dynnargh dhis! This is the Language Museum, where you can learn some simple facts about the Cornish language.

Navigate the museum using the arrow keys.

If you're interested in the Cornish language, you can learn more here:

  • The Cornish Language Office of the Cornwall Council, where you can sign up for Kevren, the Cornish Language newsletter.
  • Go Cornish, a website full of resources for learners of all ages.
  • Henry Jenner's A Handbook of the Cornish Language, the original document of the Cornish language revival.
